mapper.select: SELECT nNo, title,getUserName(regUserId) as userName,content,regDate,modUserId,departName,getCodeName('DEPT',departName) AS deptCodeName,hits FROM departNotice WHERE nNo = #{nNo}
select * from comment where tbType='team' and tbKey=${nNo}
mapper.delete: delete from comment where cNo=${cNo} and tbType='team' and tbKey=${tbKey}
mapper.update: update comment set comment='${comment}',modDate=sysdate() where cNo=${cNo} and tbKey=${tbKey} and tbType='team'
update departNotice set hits = hits+1 where nNo = ${nNo}
